ingredients.ingredient: 1 teaspoon smoked Cheddar salt (such as Bitterman)

cookingTips: Slice potatoes very thinly with a mandoline for crispy chips
Soak sliced potatoes in cold water for 30 minutes, then dry thoroughly to remove starch
Don't overlap chips - arrange in single layer for even crisping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Walk me through making homemade potato chips in the air fryer with proper slicing and seasoning technique.
